Hello Sunday Morning

Overview

Hello Sunday Morning is an Australian charity working to change Australia's relationship with alcohol. We want to create a world where drinking is an individual choice, not a cultural expectation. A world where confidence and identity aren’t measured in standard servings. A world of better choices, fewer hangovers and unforgettable Sunday mornings. For those who need it, we build technology that supports any individual to change their relationship with alcohol. Whether it is taking a break from drinking or simply cutting back – we are here to support you and your choice.

Role

Management of brand consistency by supporting our mission, vision, values and tone of voice. Creation of and adherence to brand guidelines, print collateral (reports, flyers, brochures etc), digital collateral (presentations, social media content, digital workbook). Web design, photography and social media management
